Class StudentDashboard

java.lang.Object
com.panotify.ui.student.StudentDashboard
public class StudentDashboard extends Object
Main dashboard for students Manages navigation between different tabs

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentDashboard

      public StudentDashboard(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, Student student, UserService userService, CourseService courseService, ExamService examService)
      Creates a new StudentDashboard with the necessary services and user data
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - the JavaFX stage for displaying the dashboard
      student - the logged-in student user
      userService - service for user-related operations
      courseService - service for course-related operations
      examService - service for exam-related operations
